SEARCH
Package src.HRS.Model

Class Hotel

java.lang.Object
src.HRS.Model.Hotel
public class Hotel extends Object
Represents a hotel with a name, base price, list of rooms, ist of reservations, and list of date price modifiers.

      Constructs a new Hotel with the specified name and initializes rooms and date price modifiers.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - the name of the hotel
      standardAmount - the number of standard rooms
      deluxeAmount - the number of deluxe rooms
      executiveAmount - the number of executive rooms

    • countRooms

      public int countRooms(int type)
      Counts the number of rooms per type. Also counts the total rooms.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of room (0 - total, 1 - standard, 2 - deluxe, 3 - executive)
      Returns:
      the number of rooms given selected type.

    • checkRoomAvailability

      public int[] checkRoomAvailability(Room room)
      Checks the availability of a specific room across all days of the month.
      Parameters:
      room - the room to check
      Returns:
      an array representing the availability of the room (0 = available, 1 = booked)

    • checkDateAvailability

      public int checkDateAvailability(int start, int end, int type)
      Checks date availability across all rooms of a given type and returns the index of an available room.
      Parameters:
      start - the start date
      end - the end date
      type - the type of room (1 - standard, 2 - deluxe, 3 - executive)
      Returns:
      the index of an available room, or -1 if none are available

    • addReservation

      public void addReservation(String guestName, int checkInDate, int checkOutDate, Room room)
      Adds a reservation to the hotel.
      Parameters:
      guestName - the name of the guest
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      room - the room to reserve
